puzzle.mechanic_statement: Hunter has more werewolf neighbors than Reid
puzzle.statement: I've counted the howls around the village: more of our kind press in around Hunter than they do around Reid.

puzzle.mechanic_statement: exactly 0 of the 1 werewolf below Yusuf are neighbors of Lucy
puzzle.statement: I swear there is exactly one wolf lurking somewhere beneath Yusuf in that column, but whoever it is has never come close enough to stand beside Lucy.

puzzle.mechanic_statement: exactly 2 of the 2 villagers to the right of Ava are neighbors of Celia
puzzle.statement: Both of the villagers sitting to Ava's right sleep close enough to Celia that they could hear her breathing through the night.

puzzle.mechanic_statement: exactly 1 of the 1 werewolf to the right of Faith are neighbors of Raina
puzzle.statement: That single wolf to Faith's right? They're close enough to brush past my chair — I'm one of their neighbors.

puzzle.mechanic_statement: Ava and Raina have the same number of villager neighbors
puzzle.statement: Count the calm, honest faces around Ava and around Raina — you'll find they are watched by the same number of true villagers.

puzzle.mechanic_statement: Dean is one of the 7 werewolf neighbors of Bianca
puzzle.statement: Seven hungry wolves circle Bianca's spot, and quiet Dean is definitely one of the beasts breathing down her neck.

puzzle.mechanic_statement: exactly 0 of the 1 villager to the right of Hunter are neighbors of Chase
puzzle.statement: The lone villager sitting to Hunter's right has never stood close enough to Chase to share even a whisper.
Look along Willow's row — everyone to her left has the look of a beast; there isn't a single true villager sitting there.

puzzle.mechanic_statement: exactly 1 of the 1 villager below Faith are neighbors of Reid
puzzle.statement: Only one honest soul sits anywhere beneath Faith in that column, and that same villager is close enough to Reid to watch him all night.

puzzle.mechanic_statement: Raina and Celia have the same number of villager neighbors
puzzle.statement: However many true villagers gather around Raina, you'll find Celia surrounded by exactly the same number of them.

puzzle.mechanic_statement: all werewolves in column 1 are connected
puzzle.statement: Every wolf lurking in the first column can pad up or down to reach another of our kind without ever having to cross a villager between them.
Say what you like, but Hunter is just a simple villager — no claws, no howl, just a lonely soul.

puzzle.mechanic_statement: Ava is one of the 4 werewolf neighbors of Chase
puzzle.statement: Chase is hemmed in by four lurking wolves, and I know for certain that Ava is one of the monsters at his side.
I know I sound nervous, but please believe me — I'm just a plain old villager.
If you're listening closely, I'll whisper the truth: Willow is one of the wolves stalking this village.
